languages.text: {n}Пока Корнелиус смотрит на вашу руку, лежащую на оружии, страх мечется в его глазах. Он говорит тихо и сбивчиво, не поднимая головы.{/n} "Простите, простите меня, Ваша Светлость... я... я больше не могу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Пока Корнелиус смотрит на вашу руку, лежащую на оружие, страх мечется в его глазах. Он опускается в низком поклоне и говорит тихо и сбивчиво, не поднимая головы.{/n} "Простите, простите меня, Ваша Милость... Я... не все вам рассказал".
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: {n}You see the flash of terror in Cornelius's eyes as he stares at your hand on your weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head:{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I... can't do it anymore."
languages.original_text: {n}Пока Корнелиус смотрит на вашу руку, лежащую на оружии, страх мечется в его глазах. Он говорит тихо и сбивчиво, не поднимая головы.{/n} "Простите, простите меня, Ваша Светлость... я... я больше не могу".

traits.locale_text: {n}The fear is dashing in Cornelius's eyes, looking at your hand that is gripping a weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head.{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I can not do it anymore."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

traits.locale_text: {n}The fear is dashing in Cornelius's eyes, looking at your hand that is gripping a weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head.{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I can not do it anymore."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

traits.locale_text: {n}The fear is dashing in Cornelius' eyes as he looks at your hand gripping a weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head.{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I-I... cannot do it anymore."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

traits.locale_text: {n}The fear is dashing in Cornelius' eyes as he looks at your hand gripping a weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head.{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I-I... cannot do it anymore."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

traits.locale_text: {n}You see the flash of terror in Cornelius's eyes as he stares at your hand on your weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head:{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I... can't do it anymore."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

traits.locale_text: {n}You see the flash of terror in Cornelius's eyes as he stares at your hand on your weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head:{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I... can't do it anymore."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: {n}あなたの手が武器を握るのを見て、コーネリアスの目に恐怖が走る。彼は顔を上げずに動揺をあらわに小声で話す。{/n}「許してください、お許しください、陛下…わ、私は…もう無理です」
languages.original_text: {n}You see the flash of terror in Cornelius's eyes as he stares at your hand on your weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head:{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I... can't do it anymore."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの手が武器を握るのを見て、コーネリアスの目に恐怖が走る。彼は顔を上げずに動揺をあらわに小声で話す。{/n}「許してください、お許しください、陛下…わ、私は…もう無理です」
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: {n}当你握住武器的时候，科尼利厄斯的眼中闪过了恐惧之色。他的声音细如蚊蚋，语无伦次，几乎不敢抬起头来。{/n}“请原谅我，请原谅我，大人……我……我实在受不了了。”
languages.original_text: {n}You see the flash of terror in Cornelius's eyes as he stares at your hand on your weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head:{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I... can't do it anymore."

traits.locale_text: {n}看到你握住武器，科尼利厄斯的眼中迸射出强烈的恐惧。他的声音细如蚊蚋，语无伦次，几乎不敢抬起头来。{/n}“请原谅我，请原谅我，大人……我……我实在受不了了。”
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Cornelius s'emplissent de terreur en vous voyant saisir votre arme. Sans oser lever la tête, il s'empresse d'ajouter :{/n} « Pardon, pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie... Je... je... je ne peux plus... »
languages.original_text: {n}You see the flash of terror in Cornelius's eyes as he stares at your hand on your weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head:{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I... can't do it anymore."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Cornelius s'emplissent de terreur en vous voyant saisir votre arme. Sans oser lever la tête, il s'empresse d'ajouter :{/n} « Pardon, pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie... Je... je ne peux plus... »
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: {n}Detectas un brillo de terror en los ojos de Cornelius al verte empuñar el arma. Habla en voz baja sin levantar la cabeza.{/n} «Perdóneme, perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}... No... puedo más».
languages.original_text: {n}You see the flash of terror in Cornelius's eyes as he stares at your hand on your weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head:{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I... can't do it anymore."

traits.locale_text: {n}El miedo se abre camino en los ojos de Cornelius al verte empuñar el arma. Habla en voz baja sin levantar la cabeza.{/n} «Perdóneme, perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}... No... puedo más».
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: {n}Du siehst das Entsetzen in Cornelius' Augen aufblitzen, als er auf deine Hand auf deiner Waffe starrt. Er spricht leise und konfus, ohne den Kopf zu heben.{/n} "Vergebt mir, vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich ... Ich ... ich k-kann es nicht mehr."
languages.original_text: {n}You see the flash of terror in Cornelius's eyes as he stares at your hand on your weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head:{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I... can't do it anymore."

traits.locale_text: {n}Angst springt in Cornelius' Augen, als er deine Hand an deiner Waffe sieht. Er spricht leise und konfus, ohne den Kopf zu heben.{/n} "Vergebt mir, vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich ... ich k-kann es nicht mehr."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: {n}Eline ve silahına bakakalan Cornelius'un gözlerinde dehşet beliriyor. Başını kaldırmadan, kısık ve şaşkın bir tonla konuşuyor.{/n} "Bağışlayın, bağışlayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... B... Ben... Artık dayanamayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}You see the flash of terror in Cornelius's eyes as he stares at your hand on your weapon. He speaks quietly and confusedly, without raising his head:{/n} "Forgive me, forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I... I... can't do it anymore."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eline ve silahına bakakalan Cornelius'un gözlerinde dehşet beliriyor. Başını kaldırmadan, kısık ve şaşkın bir tonla konuşuyor:{/n} "Bağışlayın, bağışlayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... B... Ben... Artık dayanamayacağım."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam
